StringTable.Label: Tier0Mercenary00_Dec
StringTable.String: Mercenary used for placement when making templates. Will not be visible player, in finished version.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Shares Range with Fleet

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanSurveyIcon] Survey Ship [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] Earns 25 credits per anomaly Surveyed.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ImmuneToNebula] Immune to Nebula Effects [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignored by Pirates

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent06_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Very Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long ship range.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Mining_Icon] +100% To resource yields of Mining Starbase ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +100% influence per turn of any Starbase ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +3 to the Area of Effect of any starbase that the ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Holds more colonist [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20% Raw Production to any colony founded with this ship.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Can Colonize Aquatic, Frozen, and Desert Extreme Worlds.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent13_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanInvadeIcon] Can invade worlds before age of War.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StarbaseSupport] Builds a starbase with 5 free modules.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent15_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +5 Raw Production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent16_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +15% manufacturing to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent17_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 Research points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +5 Morale points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +5 Credits per turn to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Hitpoints_Icon] Has the hit points of a medium ship

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamRangeIcon] +50% Beam Range [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] Ignores 75% of Beam Damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent23_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignores 30% of all damage taken. [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype beam weapon.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent24_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful Prototype missiles. [ICON=Stat_Handy_Icon] Repairs Instantly at end of battle

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent25_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype Beam weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Prototype hyper drive.

StringTable.Label: Tier1MercenaryComponent26_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +50% its Beam attack, as well as all ships in its fleet. [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] High defenses and Hit Points.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: Old Module was removed do to game mechanic changes. (Left as placeholder)

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: Old Module was removed do to game mechanic changes. (Left as placeholder)

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StarbaseSupport] Instant 100 Influence points when constructed. [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] 100% Influence per turn thereafter.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] Builds trade route with double normal yields. [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Re-Spawns on home world if broken.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent06_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AscensionPointsStatIcon] Doubles the bonus given precursor studies.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent07_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ApprovalStatIcon] +100% Approval to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +5 Credits per turn any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +5 Research points to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent10_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +100% influence per turn of any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +150 Points to the base influence of any colony while ship is stationed there.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Malevolent_Icon] +5 Malevolent Ideology points each time ship, or fleet it is in, wins a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent14_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Prototype Mass drivers [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Extremely long range

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent18_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% to the moves of all ships in fleet

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=ShieldStrengthIcon] All ships in fleet receive a free 10 points of shields defense

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% range to all weapons in fleet [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] +30% rate of fire to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Evasion to all ships in fleet [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] +30% Accuracy to all weapons in fleet.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent22_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAttackIcon] All ships in fleet ignore 75% of all mass driver damage.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent23_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=StatTooltipBreakdown_Military_Icon] +100% to military production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier2MercenaryComponent24_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +50% fleet evasion and salvages 250 Credits each time it survives a battle.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent01_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] +100% to the Area of Effect of any starbase that the ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent02_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=CanColonizeIcon] Turn any one dead planet into a Class 16 Habitable planet.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent03_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=AreaofEffectIcon] Instantly Flips any non capital planet in Area of Effect.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent04_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +25% manufacturing to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent05_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] +25% Research to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent06_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Credits_Icon] +25% Credits per turn to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent07_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Raw_Productive_Icon] +10% Raw Production to any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent08_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=InfluenceGrowth_Icon] +250 Points to the base influence and +100% influence per turn of any planet ship is stationed at.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent09_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Assault drones [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 4 Escort drones [ICON=FightersCap_Icon] 5 Assault Fighters

StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful prototype Mass drivers [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] High defenses of all types

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent11_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=BeamAugmentIcon] Powerful Beam Weapons [ICON=ShipLogistics_Icon] Only takes up 2 Logistics points.

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent12_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=MissileAugmentIcon] Powerful missile weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent14_Dec

StringTable.String: [ICON=KineticAugmentIcon] Powerful Mass Drivers [ICON=KineticRangeIcon] +100% mass driver range

StringTable.String: [ICON=AllWeaponsIcon] Powerful Prototype Weapons [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Long Range [ICON=Moves_Icon] Fast

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent19_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Moves_Icon] +50% Moves to all ships in fleet [ICON=Shiprange_Icon] Entire Fleet is given 350 tile Range

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent20_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Planetary_Defense_Icon] +10 to the all defenses in fleet [ICON=Stat_Special_Icon] Ignores 75% of all damage

StringTable.Label: Tier3MercenaryComponent21_Dec
StringTable.String: [ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Powerful Mass Drivers [ICON=Stat_Ship_Maintenance_Icon] Increases strategic and tactical repair for entire fleet.
